events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn’t arrived yet. The tracking number shows no updates and I’m very concerned about the delay.
The system identified the issue as a delivery delay based on keywords found in the customer’s initial complaint.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in shipping and delivery issues for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the shipping delay you are experiencing. Let me help you with this.
Could you please provide the order number and the tracking number so I can investigate the status of your shipment more accurately?
Sure, the order number is 987654321 and the tracking number is TRK123456789. I checked online but the status hasn’t changed in days.
Thank you for the details. I have contacted the shipping partner and raised a priority inquiry. We expect an update within 48 hours and will keep you informed.
I appreciate your quick response and the priority inquiry. I hope to get some news soon as I really need the package urgently.
The shipping partner confirmed the package was delayed due to a local transit issue but it is now out for delivery and should arrive by end of day.
We wanted to check in and confirm that your package arrived as expected. Please let us know if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Since the issue has been resolved and you have confirmed receipt of your package, we will now close this case. Thank you for your patience.
